GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 28 May 2024
The prevailing showery and windy conditions over the island are expected to continue further, due to
the active South West Monsoonal condition.

S
howers will occur at times in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, North-western and Southern provinces.

H
eavy showers above 100 mm are likely at some places in Western and Sabaragamuwa province and in
Nuwara-Eliya district.

S
howers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  a  few  places  in  Uva  province  and  in  Ampara  and  Batticaloa
districts in the evening or night.

S
trong winds of about (50-60) kmph can be expected at times over Western slopes of the central hills and
in  Northern,  North-central,  Western,  Southern  and  North-western  provinces  and  in  Trincomalee  and
Monaragala districts.
